div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 07:54 am CDT

div.div: A chance of showers, then showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm after 4pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 68. South wind 9 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.
Showers and possibly a thunderstorm. Low around 52. Southeast wind 7 to 14 mph becoming northeast after midnight. Chance of precipitation is 90%.
A 30 percent chance of showers, mainly before 8am. Cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly sunny, with a high near 67. North wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.
